column4: I'm on Ubuntu 8.04.  I want to test a live Ubuntu CD.  My systems doesn't seem to be booting from a CD.  How do I get into my bios or is there another way?
every bios is different, on boot the bios tells you how
try a bunch - f2, del, any of the f keys.
that's why i said look for the message.  they almost always say *something* like "hit del to enter setup"
